text: Pulaski is a British television drama series produced by the BBC in 1987. Created by Roy Clarke, the series was a parody of detective dramas centred around Larry Summers, an American actor starring in a British detective series in the title role of Pulaski, who finds himself involved in real life cases. He was assisted by his co-star Kate Smith, who played his sidekick Briggsy in the series. The theme music was performed by The Shadows. ==Cast== * David Andrews - Larry Summers/Pulaski * Caroline Langrishe - Kate Smith/Briggsy * Kate Harper - Paula Wilson * Rolf Saxon - Jerome Summers ==Episodes== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- style="color:#000000" ! style="background: #CFECEC;"|# ! style="background: #CFECEC;"|Title ! style="background: #CFECEC;"|Directed by ! style="background: #CFECEC;"|Written by ! style="background: #CFECEC;"|Original airdate (UK) |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:BBC television dramas Category:1980s British drama television series Category:1987 British television series debuts Category:1987 British television series endings Category:Detective television series Category:English-language television shows
